title: Retirement Advisor: Reframing Today’s ‘Crisis’
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: The retirement system in the U.S. consists of three pillars, and each is continually getting wobblier, as Roger Salus details in his most recent article on Seeking Alpha. The emerging reality seems to be that retirement is becoming a luxury that decreasing numbers will be able to afford. This brief podcast (5:12) argues that the choice has come down to enjoyment of luxuries in one’s earlier years or later ones, and offers ideas on how to view the household balance sheet and conceptualize “crisis.” Learn more about your ad choices.
